name: mailtowp-v2
description: MailToWP v2 - Desktop application for email to WordPress conversion

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter main dev" "pnpm --filter renderer dev" "pnpm --filter api dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter main build && pnpm --filter renderer build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter main clean && pnpm --filter renderer clean && pnpm --filter api clean
